content:
hey guys.

looking for extremely good lean4 experts*. good to have USAMO, IMO, other olympiads, deep understanding of math problems solutions on that level. we have a job, we are paying 50+ an hour. please contact me. if this message violates ToS of this forum, PLEASE LMK. if you know people who can help us, lets chat too!
A message was moved here from #general > Lean in the wild by Michael Rothgang.

Would you happen to have a more verbose job description, especially with regards to its responsibilities and goals?

I just think you'd find more interest when describing the job more formally, rather than just its requirements, though mentioning pay was likely somewhat helpful too.

Pay is good to be mentionned, but what currency is it ? Is it remote work ? Is it an independant worker you're looking for ?
If so In programming field, 50$ or â‚¬ /hr is on the very very low end.

yes, remote work, in USD.

Good catch, 50 might be really low end, but it's not a hard block, we can pay much more depending on qualifications. Any interested person can dm and we can have a quick call. I'm not sure that I want to write about something more specific and add more details in this huge public thread besides that we need to find a person who can manually verify lean4 code, write own, fix bugs. All other details in dm, call.
Can you at least disclose what company you are recruiting for and what your name is?
I think it is high enough compared to China.
Since purchasing power differs across regions, comparisons between them are not truly meaningful.
